Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to define static resources in one place for easy access and to avoid cluttering the rest of the codebase. All resources can be imported at once like this:

    import static ca.mcgill.ecse211.lab3.Resources.*;

    Author:
    Mustafain, Bruno, Jasper

      • INITIAL_DIST_THRESHOLD

        public static final int INITIAL_DIST_THRESHOLD
        Initial reading from ultrasonic sensor should be larger than this value because through testing, we have found that if the robot begins localization facing the wall, then the errors will be high.

        This value represents an initial distance threshold that the ultrasonic sensor must read before the localization process will begin.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TURNING_ERROR

        public static final double TURNING_ERROR
        Error value tuned to get proper turns on the wheels.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MOTOR_ROT

        public static final int MOTOR_ROT
        Wheel speed during rotation after localization is finished (deg/sec).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TURN_90

        public static final int TURN_90
        90 degrees relative to the robot hardware. For example, calling turnBy(TURN_90) will make the robot turn 90 degrees.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TURN_180

        public static final int TURN_180
        180 degrees relative to the robot hardware. For example, calling turnBy(TURN_180) will make the robot turn 180 degrees.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
